articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: Kamala Harris set to unveil $1 billion plan in Ghana to promote women’s economic empowerment - Fox News
articles.description: In Ghana, Vice President Kamala Harris will reveal a $1 billion plan to help bolster the country's economy as Washington looks to build relationships across Africa.
articles.content: Vice President Kamala Harris is set to unveil a $1 billion initiative to promote womens economic empowerment in the country of Ghana, where she has spent several days touring and meeting with governm… [+3167 chars]
